snippet.title: [PC] The 3D Adventures of Sailor Moon | Full Gameplay Walkthrough
snippet.description:
The 3D Adventures of Sailor Moon (2023) Gameplay Walkthrough No Commentary 1440p 60fps HD let's play playthrough review guide 

🌴 Description 🎮

The 3D Adventures of Sailor Moon" is a Canadian-American 2D/3D mini-game based on the Sailor Moon English Dub that was released in 1997. It was released for Windows 95 but is still playable on Windows 98, 98SE, and Windows XP. The game was developed by 3VR Inc under the license from DiC Entertainment.

Queen Beryl has stolen the Sailor Scout's Transformation Pens, with the player's mission being to retrieve the pen in each different play area; the Galactic Moon Library, the Magical Puzzle Room, Moon Castle TV Show, Sing A Long, Crystal Fighting Arena, and Fashion Salon.

💖 If you liked the video please remember to leave a Like & Comment, I appreciate it a lot! 🔔
